mapper.select: /*총 게시물 수 조회*/ SELECT /*alcCountTopCate*/ COUNT(1) FROM ALCOHOL A

/*주류 전체 조회(LIMIT 함수 사용) 기존에 사용하던 ROWNUM 사용 안함.(정렬에 문제가 있으므로 변경), 이양원*/ SELECT /*alcoholLstIqrPager*/ A.ALCOHOL_ID , A.ALC_IMG_ID , (SELECT TOPCATEGORY_ID FROM TOPCATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND TOPCATEGORY_ID = B.TOPCATEGORY_ID) AS TOPCATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM TOPCATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND TOPCATEGORY_ID = B.TOPCATEGORY_ID) AS TOP_NM , B.SUBCATEGORY_ID , B.NAME AS SUB_NM , A.NAME AS ALCOHOL_NM , A.DEGREE AS ALC_DEGREE , A.DETAIL AS ALC_DETAIL , C.FILENAME , A.REGDATE , A.LAST_MODI_YMD FROM ALCOHOL A INNER JOIN SUBCATEGORY B ON A.SUBCATEGORY_ID = B.SUBCATEGORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ALC_IMG C ON A.ALCOHOL_ID = C.ALCOHOL_ID WHERE 1=1 /*검색 기능 추가 전(mybatis 조건 부여 예정)*/ /*AND ALCOHOL_NM LIKE '%'||ALCOHOL_NM||'%' */ ORDER BY ALCOHOL_ID DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}/*시작 행, 출력할 갯수*/

/*주류 상세 조회, 이양원*/ SELECT /*alcoholLstDtl*/ A.ALCOHOL_ID , A.ALC_IMG_ID , (SELECT TOPCATEGORY_ID FROM TOPCATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND TOPCATEGORY_ID = B.TOPCATEGORY_ID) AS TOPCATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM TOPCATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND TOPCATEGORY_ID = B.TOPCATEGORY_ID) AS TOP_NM , B.SUBCATEGORY_ID , B.NAME AS SUB_NM , A.NAME AS ALCOHOL_NM , A.DEGREE AS ALC_DEGREE , A.DETAIL AS ALC_DETAIL , C.FILENAME , A.REGDATE , A.LAST_MODI_YMD FROM ALCOHOL A INNER JOIN SUBCATEGORY B ON A.SUBCATEGORY_ID = B.SUBCATEGORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ALC_IMG C ON A.ALC_IMG_ID = C.ALC_IMG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.ALCOHOL_ID = #{ALCOHOL_ID}
/*주류 상위 카테고리 조회, 이양원*/ SELECT /*topLst*/ TOPCATEGORY_ID , NAME AS TOP_NM FROM TOPCATEGORY ORDER BY TOPCATEGORY_ID
/*주류 하위 카테고리 조회, 이양원*/ SELECT /*subLst*/ SUBCATEGORY_ID , TOPCATEGORY_ID , NAME AS SUB_NM FROM SUBCATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND TOPCATEGORY_ID = #{TOPCATEGORY_ID}
mapper.insert: /*주류 이미지 등록, 이양원*/ INSERT INTO ALC_IMG ( ALC_IMG_ID , ALCOHOL_ID , FILENAME , THUMB_YN , REGDATE , LAST_MODI_YMD ) SELECT /*(SELECT NVL(MAX(ALC_IMG_ID),0 )+ 1 FROM ALC_IMG) AS ALC_IMG_ID 서비스단에서 조건 부여, 2021. 06. 12 by 이양원 */ #{ALC_IMG_ID} , NVL(MAX(A.ALCOHOL_ID), 0) AS ALCOHOL_ID , #{FILENAME} AS FILENAME , #{THUMB_YN} AS THUMB_YN , SYSDATE() , SYSDATE() FROM ALCOHOL A
mapper.delete: /*주류 이미지 삭제, 이양원*/ DELETE /*alcoholImgDel*/ FROM ALC_IMG WHERE 1=1 AND ALCOHOL_ID = (SELECT A.ALCOHOL_ID FROM ALCOHOL A , ALC_IMG B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ALCOHOL_ID = B.ALCOHOL_ID AND A.ALCOHOL_ID = #{ALCOHOL_ID})
